page.title: 12MIDCOUL FARM
page.content: Midcoul farm is one and a half miles away from Croy.It is owned by Moray Estates and it has been tenanted by Mr Rose since 1906. Midcoul was built in the 1840s and is 300 acres.The livestock consists mainly of 1100 pigs. A few years ago Midcoul had some cows but no more have come.The builders that work on the farm are Mr Andrews from Lochandinty and Dave Macullach who lives near Petty West School.There are lots of old buildings on the farm which are not used anymore.Near Midcoul there is another farm it is called Culblair Farm,it also has pigs on it but mostly it stores all the machinery.
